testcase.name: Post call with Authentication
testcase.system-out: * def Authentication = call read('UserDetailsAuthentication.feature') ..... passed * def authToken = Authentication.accessToken .............................. passed * def requestpayload = read('../utils/Userdetails.json') .................. passed When url 'https://reqres.in/api/users' .................................... passed And header Authorization = authToken ...................................... passed And request requestpayload ................................................ passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed * print 'Authentication response', response ............................... passed
